item.title: Comparing Records, Structs, and Classes in C#: When to Use What?
item.description: C# provides a few ways to define typesâ€”records, structures, and classes. Each has its own qualities and limitations. In this blog post, I will discuss each construct and help you identify which one to use in your project. What is a class in C#? A class defines reference types, Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/comparing-records-structs-and-classes-in-c-when-to-use-what/
